title: Compose AI: Automated Your Writing
introduction: Compose AI is an AI-powered writing tool that helps users generate text using AI, autocomplete sentences, write emails, create documents, and chat faster. It is trusted by 10,000+ teams and 400,000 people, backed by YCombinator.
hasFreeTrial: The plugin is free to use forever, and there is a premium version with some advanced features including personalization features.
targetPeople: Writers, professionals, individuals looking to save time on writing tasks.
pricing: Free to use forever with a premium version available for advanced features.

faqs.question: What is Compose AI?
faqs.answer: Compose AI is a free Chrome plugin that accelerates writing, allows autocomplete anywhere, and reduces typing time.

faqs.question: What is the cost?
faqs.answer: The plugin is free to use forever, with a premium version available for advanced features.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: Support can be contacted at support@composeai.com for any questions or assistance.

faqs.question: What about my privacy?
faqs.answer: Compose AI takes privacy seriously, using text only for providing autocomplete suggestions and never selling user data. View the privacy policy for more details.
